name: ReIncarnate
description:
What happens in the after life? Do you keep your memories from your past life or are you force to forget them? In exchange for remembering, would you give up your chances of returning back to heaven? Help Eva make her decision in this interactive narrative game!

Controls:
WASD to move + Shift to run
Space to Jump
E to interact with things
R to restart game from title screen
ESC to exit game
